author: sseth
msg: MAPREDUCE-3902. Initial set of changes towards AM Container re-use.
Separate module hadoop-mapreduce-client-app2 created as a copy of hadoop-mapreduce-client-app. Option to choose between the AMs.
Container and Node state machines added, TaskAttempt, RMContainerAllocator/RMRequestor modified to work with these.
